title: Frontend Developer (React)
description: Demonstrates proficiency in building user interfaces using React, including component architecture, state management, and API integration.

title: Rest API (Intermediate)
description: Validates intermediate-level understanding of RESTful API design, HTTP methods, status codes, and endpoint structuring.

title: Java (Basic)
description: Certifies basic knowledge of Java programming, including data types, control flow, and foundational syntax.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Indicates readiness for a Software Engineer internship role, covering programming fundamentals, debugging, and problem-solving skills.

title: JavaScript (Basic)
description: Shows foundational understanding of JavaScript, including variables, functions, loops, and basic DOM manipulation.

title: SQL (Intermediate)
description: Demonstrates ability to write complex SQL queries using JOINs, GROUP BY, subqueries, and data analysis techniques.

title: SQL (Basic)
description: Certifies basic SQL skills, including SELECT statements, filtering with WHERE, and simple table operations.
